    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Starting point of the program. It sets the fonts and initializes the buttons. Additionally the used objects are initialized and the resolution of the auditive representation is calculated.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Displays the image according to the statemachine that is implemented inside. It is connected to the buttons.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Function to stop the oscillators from playing after a set period of time

      • fileSelected

        public void fileSelected(java.io.File selection)
        Function to load the selected image into the variables for the ChoosePictureApp.
        Parameters:
        selection - The File that was selected by the user. +
